content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1481531763691{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Garage Door Repair and Installation” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]At United Home Services, we strive to offer the highest quality garage door services at the most competitive rates. From something as simple as a broken garage door roller to something as complicated as installing a brand new garage door, we can take care of all your home service needs and ensure a clean and safe living environment for you and your family.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16747″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”What Makes United Home Services Stand Out From The Rest?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our Technicians Are Licensed And Certified

We know that your garage door is too expensive and too important for you to be trusted with someone who claims to be a technician but does not have the necessary qualifications or expertise. It’s why we only employ technicians who are not only highly skilled but are also properly licensed and certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We Are Bonded And Insured

We are bonded, which means you can be sure that we will fulfill all our contractual obligations and complete the projects we take up in a timely manner. The surety bond is a sign of our credibility, professionalism, and accountability.

We are insured, which means you will not be held liable if a technician gets injured on your property. For instance, if a technician falls while repairing your garage door, you cannot be held liable for the injuries they suffer. Since we carry liability insurance, the injured worker can file a claim against our insurance company and get the compensation they need.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We Have Access to Nationwide Resources

We have been in the home services business for more than 20 years, during the course of which we have built a network of vendors, subcontractors, and other third parties that we can rely on. We have the necessary infrastructure to handle all your home service needs – from garage door repairs to full replacements – in a timely manner.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We Can Handle Your Emergency Repair Needs

There is no telling when your garage door might break down. For instance, if a large branch falls on your home after a storm and causes critical damage, you need to get it fixed immediately.

At United Home Services, we have the manpower to handle all your emergency repair needs – no matter what time of the day it is. All you have to do is call us and tell us what your problem is. We will dispatch a technician or a team of technicians – depending on how serious the problem is – to your location as quickly as we can.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We Have a Stellar Reputation in the Home Services Industry

For over 20 years, our name has been synonymous with quality, reliability, and excellence. Every time we take up a project – whether it is a routine garage door inspection or a complex garage reinstallation project – we put in a tremendous amount of effort and go the extra mile to make sure we exceed our clients’ expectations.

As a result, we remain the trusted choice of thousands of customers across the country for all their home service needs. You can check out our testimonials section or take a look at Google reviews to find out what our customers think of us and the services we provide.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We Have a Stellar Reputation in the Home Services Industry

For over 20 years, our name has been synonymous with quality, reliability, and excellence. Every time we take up a project – whether it is a routine garage door inspection or a complex garage reinstallation project – we put in a tremendous amount of effort and go the extra mile to make sure we exceed our clients’ expectations.

As a result, we remain the trusted choice of thousands of customers across the country for all their home service needs. You can check out our testimonials section or take a look at Google reviews to find out what our customers think of us and the services we provide.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
